alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:04PM MDT until July 03 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FREMONT AND NORTHEASTERN SWEETWATER COUNTIES... At 503 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were moving east across the Sweetwater River Basin, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bairoil, Green Mountain and Split Rock. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Fremont County. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
